text: Ian Stephens (born 22 May 1952)Ian Stephens player profile Scrum.com is a former international rugby union player. A prop, he toured twice with the British and Irish Lions, to South Africa in 1980 and New Zealand in 1983 and at the time played club rugby for Bridgend RFC. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Rugby union players from Cardiff Category:Welsh rugby union players Category:British and Irish Lions rugby union players from Wales Category:Rugby union props Category:Bridgend RFC players Category:Living people
title: Ian Stephens (rugby player)
